ygData.subject: Re: Subject: RE: Re: RE: Sol Ro Temple Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Funny, everyone remembers her from WK, but I know I was in Qhills, right around the tower on the way TO WK. I know because i looked in the tower looking for
ygData.messageBody:
Funny, everyone remembers her from WK, but I know I was in Qhills, right
around the tower on the way TO WK. I know because i looked in the tower
looking for this guard she disliked so much.

BTW, if you happen upon a Guard's body and happen to loot a no-drop
"guard bracer" and think "maybe this is the one the Captain in NK guard
tower is looking for" and you decide to give it to him, If you are wrong
and it is from a good guard, you better be ready to take the jump off
the tower, because is appears he can tell the difference... not that I
would know (rubbing his backside from the fall).

Uldar Ulfangson
35th Bard, Rodcet Nife
P.S. I thought 30 was bad, then I got to 35...

> > she is talking about Guard McCluskey right?
>
> Yes. Misty Storyswapper is her name, and she is in West Karana.
> She tells you how Guard McCluskey is making her life hard, blah
> blah. She wouldnt tell you anything more for fear of her life.
>
> NPC: Guard McCluskey
>
> level....: 34
> type.....: warrior
> magic....: none
> special..: none
> resists..: increased magic resist
> atk......: double, bash, kick
> dmg......: 60-80
> hp.......: ~1500
> faction..: (-)corruptqeynosguards, (+)qeynosguards, etc.
>
>
> Related Quests: The Captian in North Karana stone bridge tower
> is seeking corrupt guard bracelets, bringing
> McCluskey's bracelet (NODROP) to him yields
> a few copper and a random rusty weapon 8)
>
> Harmonic. (no you wont find all this on Alla's site, it's my info ;p)
